name: LifeBase
description: Have you ever feel the need to destroy something? This is the game for you. Be able to go in and destroy everything you desire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Inter Core i3 or Amd A8 or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
